website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful rug from one of the most reputable rug makers. The price is not exorbitant considering the brand's focus on quality.
pros: A thin rug that fits well under furniture
Lends a pop of style to any outdoor setting
some users have placed it indoors in areas that withstand a lot of foot traffic
cons: Some owners worry that the lighter colors may get dirty in an outdoor setting – others say it fares well in the elements and in well-traversed areas

customer_reviews.title: Cute rug
customer_reviews.text: I have this on my front porch and use it as a layered rug. I love it and have received compliments. Seems durable and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for! I used it to layer under our welcome mat and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan and Marina

customer_reviews.title: "Bone" Color Looked Lighter, Less Yellow/Brown in the Photo
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Safavieh outdoor rug I have ordered for under our dining room table. The last one lasted 5 years and was a grey/beige. The beige was really a cream color, which was great. This one shows like a cream color in the picture, but the color is very dark beige--almost a tan. If that's what you are hoping for, great. Me not so much. That's the problem ordering online (and differences in monitors). I hope the picture helps. Otherwise, the quality actually looks superior to the last rug.
customer_reviews.author: JoS

customer_reviews.title: Not size advertised. Significantly shorter on one side.
customer_reviews.text: This 4 x 4 rug is actually 44 x 47, not 48 x 48. I had purchased a runner in the same group and was happy and figured this would be a good fit having tried their product already. The rug arrive too tightly wrapped and warped. But the real disappointment was putting it on the floor and realizing it wasnt square and was significantly shorter on one side. The rug is smaller than the padding.
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorDesigner

customer_reviews.title: Tough enough for outdoors, but nice enough for indoors too.
customer_reviews.text: We actually bought this for our dining room to put over our hardwood floors. It's so neatly made that it actually works as an indoor carpet as well, especially if you need an area rug for high-traffic areas or a rug that will tolerate a LOT of abuse. Already taken to the car wash and pressure washed it after one mishap. Tough as nails!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur D. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug!
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful in my entryway. I kind of worry about keeping it clean but I make everyone take their shoes off before coming in anyways. :)
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, Stylish, and Low Maintenance!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this rug! It is exactly what I was looking for. Great quality and even the underside is beautiful if you want a more subdued look. I have had it outdoors on my covered condo patio for more than 6 weeks and it still looks clean and new. It is super easy to sweep and wipe off. I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: R. Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much, I bought it in two sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the 2x5 size for the front door area, and loved it so much I bought it again for our back deck. I love the color combo. The "bone" color does really well at hiding stains. Definitely recommend this! @macy.blackwell
customer_reviews.author: Macy

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to clean and looks sharp
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a doormat for my double front door. It is easy to clean and looks sharp. The entryway is covered so exposure to the elements is not a factor. The price was right considering traditional coir double sized doormats are easily twice this price.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this- looks great indoors. Seems like it will be easy to keep clean Love the beachy stripes I will say to me the bone color is more tan The gray is neutral
customer_reviews.author: artafx

customer_reviews.title: Say goodbye to using TWO rugs in your long hallway!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rug for a 15 x 3 foot, high traffic hallway area in my house. It's hard to find an attractive, affordable rug at this size for indoors! The rug layed perfectly flat upon unraveling it. We have hardwood floors so I did have to put rug tape under it as it was sliding around. It is a beautiful rug & feels very durable. It does look like an indoor rug to the eye but to the bare feet it definitely feels like an outdoor rug. My only complaint is that it smells like vinegar 😷 If you're purchasing this for indoors, invest in some rug tape for the bottom..you'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rug!
customer_reviews.text: What a great little rug this has been. I purchased this a year ago to go in our newly renovated kitchen. It has worked beautifully and what a great quality. It cleans well and does not show any wear whatsoever even though it is used daily in front of my kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rug but green color is not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I have a black/bone one of these rugs layered underneath a coir mat at my front door and it looks great! However, I just purchased the green/beige large rug for my living room and the green is NOT as pictured..it is a bright emerald green. So if you need a dark sagey green like the photo, you will be disappointed like I am. Thankfully, Amazon offers free return shipping on this item, so I am happy. Its going back.
customer_reviews.author: shopalotTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed All of Safavieh rugs I bought I loved
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed All of Safavieh rugs I bought I loved . This rug is to thin and light I used pad under still moving. I didn't feel ok to return this item because it was on the floor few days as I was trying to make it work. It is in my storage room till I will figure out what to do with it
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Layering Under a Welcome Mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 2’7” x 5’ in the Bone color to layer underneath a coir doormat, and it looks great! We have double doors on our back patio, and most mats are large and super expensive, or too dinky/wrong scale. Layering this outdoor rug under a 36” doormat gave the look I wanted without spending a ton. It dries out quickly and is a great natural color!
customer_reviews.author: Madison S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug but colors are off
customer_reviews.text: The material is very nice and seems like it will hold up well to the elements, but please note they Grey/Bone color does NOT look good with a standard brown doormat as an underlayment. I would going for that two layer look that is so popular right now and the colors clashed horribly so I’m not using this rug for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High end look, low end price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a rug for my artstudio/office that could easily be cleaned( or hosed off) but looked nice and this works perfectly! The area it is in has a " potterybarn style" feel to it and this rug looks just like something you could buy at a high end store. The colors are true to picture and the rug( more of a flat mat, no cushioning) seems to be quite durable with constant traffic from me, the dog, and the kids. So pleased, I just purchased one for my mudroom and one for my foyer in a different color and pattern.Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Noah and Gabey-Baby's mom

customer_reviews.title: Tough to clean
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this rug when brand new- however, once dirty, they are very difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: amiller

customer_reviews.title: Rug  "Sheds" or "Flakes" but looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Rug "sheds" or "flakes" blue and white dye particles after a few months. Mine is a balcony rug and sits on the balcony in the sun most of the day. After a few months it started to do this flaking and when you walk on it, it's like walking on fine blue and white colored powder and then it gets on your feet or shoes and you track it everywhere. The rug looks great when it arrives and it will hold up for 1-3 months but then it starts doing what I mentioned above. Maybe excess sun exposure? But then again... it's an outdoor rug.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Boatman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this rug to layer it underneath my doormat. The material is thick and looks sturdy enough to endure the front door traffic too. I do agree that the color is more of a tan beige (i got the gray/ivory) but it looks great! I’d post a picture but for some reason it does not give me the option to upload my picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great style
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug. Perfect for my recent renovation. Color is true to the picture as posted in the Amazon listing. It even arrived 2 days ahead of delivery date. Since I have a cat, I needed a rug that could be vacuumed and cleaned easily. It took less than 24 hours for him to “christen” the new rug. I always use a mild solution on vinegar and water. No hint of a stain.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Good rug, Easy to make non-slip
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rug. It’s not too thick, it’s well made, the colors are true to the picture and it’s a nice length. But, it’s quite slippery. So much so that in the bathroom, it’s a liability. I really do like this rug so I found a quick caulking tutorial on YouTube in order to transform this rug into non-slip. It worked perfectly! I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: monique

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Terra-cotta is brighter than it looks on here. Much prettier in person! The rug is a little thin, but my purpose was to add color to my front porch and it did just that. Found pillows that match perfectly as well! The variety in sizes with this rug was also a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom

customer_reviews.title: Great material outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: First of all it arrived on time and well packed. Quality is great and colors are very true. And the great news is, it's really a fade proof rug. We live in texas and it gets direct afternoon sunlight (100+ degrees) but no fading yet. I cant say about it getting wet but seems very easy to clean. Very promising outdoor rug. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Safavieh courtyard collection
customer_reviews.text: This rug seems well made and sturdy. The colors were not like the picture. The blue was darker and the natural color was darker. I checked to make sure the correct one was sent. This is a good rug, just know the colors are not exactly like the picture or at least, mine wasn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Paden C.

customer_reviews.title: Probably best for covered patio
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for about a year now on our uncovered patio. It has dry rotted and now deteriorating. We left the rug out in the sun and rain all year, so I imagine I could have taken it up during the winter to extend the life. But it is shredding now and creating a dusty powder. I hate it only lasted a year, but that could be common under the conditions we left it in. I’ll be replacing it with another rug to see if we get a different outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Color was okay
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and great material!! However I thought this was white and blue. It wasn’t clear white more like tan color. Over all I would give 4 stars since it’s very good material and easy to clean. I stepped on it with my dirty shoes but didn’t leave a mark :)
customer_reviews.author: 🌴🌊🌺🍹🥥🤙🏼

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect outdoor rug, exactly what I had been looking for! I ordered a different, more expensive one before this that was so thin and felt like plastic that I had to send it back. This has the right weight to it as well so it stays nice and flat. I got the black and beige so I was worried about the beige getting dirty but it’s so easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: HannahH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rug for Front Entry
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug! It’s the perfect size, color and design I was looking for. It appears sturdy and easy to clean. A great rug to layer on a front porch or to use by itself. It’s hard to find blue outdoor rugs and this one is a terrific find.
customer_reviews.author: Suburban Spunk

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in a  package bent in half
customer_reviews.text: I am going to try to re-order this rug. The one I just received had been packaged folded and bent in half. This created a permanent crease and the fibers look like they have no color. It's right up the middle and will stand out. I'm not sure why it wasn't rolled the long way as all other rugs are shipped but I don't see it relaxing enough to not show. I'm very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: kmohn

customer_reviews.title: Gray one looks exactly as picture
customer_reviews.text: Bought the gray one for my kids' treehouse and it worked perfectly. It looks exactly like the sample picture. Like that it unrolls flat, without the corners bending up like many other rugs. Given that it's in a treehouse, I'm surprised at how well it's held up with outdoor use with little maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Maria K.

customer_reviews.title: Colors are completely inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: This is the third rug I’ve ordered online and the first disappointment. There are some big knots in the rug which don’t look to good but didn’t bother me as much as the color discrepancy. It looks brown and beige on the photo but it’s actually olive green and beige.
customer_reviews.author: Spellbounds13

customer_reviews.title: Cute rug, great for a small space
customer_reviews.text: I have a small deck off my apartment that I wanted a rug for so that things would stop slipping through the slats on to my neighbor below. This rug fit the bill perfectly. It's a good size for a (very) small space. It's lightweight, but still seem durable. I'm happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kerry L Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Decent rug but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Decent price for what appears to be a durable rug. I would have given it more stars but it arrived damaged. The packaging was worn through on one end and the rug is discolored and frayed in that corner. Of course, it's still useable but a brand new rug shouldn't be tattered and frayed.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good runners, need more - disappointing that the inventory ran out. *be careful ordering; Amazon will switch between colors if your chosen color is not available in that size and it is not very apparent when that happens.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Loche

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, I will update if any issues but so far the rug is perfect. I needed something more durable for my kitchen, less soft since it’s a high traffic area, I feel like this will be perfect. It does slide around a lot tho, no backing to keep it from moving.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T

customer_reviews.title: This rug is a steal for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Great rug! Great quality! Great price! It came exactly as described and is great quality! Way cheaper than I found at department stores! I love this rug!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Lou

customer_reviews.title: A rare fail from Safavieh
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Safavieh rugs, but this one is very thin, even for an outdoor rug. Had I seen it at a Big Box store, there is no way I would have paid more than $20 for it. Not worth the money and cheap looking.
customer_reviews.author: Polish Princess

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This rug looks very nice on my city balcony. It would be more than perfect if a manufacturer would make rugs to fit city balconies which are about 4 1/2 by about 12. Odd size but there are a lot of balconies.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug. I like that it is fabric like rather than plastic or nylon like. It is easy to keep clean and looking nice. I like the color choices and pattern also. Wished it would dry quicker when it gets wet.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Webster

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed!! My 2 year old loves throwing his food on the floor. We just moved in to an apartment and someone thought it would be a good idea to have carpet in the dining area. This was easy to clean after he dumped his macaroni and cheese on it.
customer_reviews.author: John guidry

customer_reviews.title: Some flaws in the weaving
customer_reviews.text: If reviewing looks, this rug gets 5 stars. I have had a rug from this Safavieh Courtyard collection in the past that survived Hurricane Florence, and I expect the same toughness from this one. However there are 2 flaws in the weaving that are very visible on the reverse side of the rug, and minimally on the front side. Since there is so much variation in the pattern which masks the flaw, I am probably going to keep the rug rather than going through the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: WinstonDeb

customer_reviews.title: Soft and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the rug. We got this for our open backyard. It gets quite a bit of leaves and branches, but a blower easily does the job of cleaning it up easily. It’s quite soft and doesn’t have the cheap plastic feel. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: NorCal buyer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice rug- great for layering!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rug to use under smaller rugs at our front door. It is so pretty and looks great under a standard sized door mat.
customer_reviews.author: drw920

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Outdoor Choice
customer_reviews.text: This rug defines an outdoor seating area for my patio. The color did not disappoint with a beautiful cream and medium tone denim blue plus the stripe pattern is eye catching. I have several Safavieh rugs inside and out and the quality is superb. Cleaning spills or mud is so easy with just water! I always view Safavieh rugs first for outside and by entrance doors.
customer_reviews.author: CMK

customer_reviews.title: Not happy 👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t fit its purpose. It is so slippery on wooden floors and stitching at the ends makes it difficult to flatten out I am not happy with my purchase and will return.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for patio or other outdoor space
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great outdoor rug. I would not recommend having it exposed to the elements, but for a covered patio or some other protected outdoor space it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rojas

customer_reviews.title: DOING GREAT IN AZ SUN 🌞
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to put under my 2 chaise loungers out by my pool. So far it still looks great even under 105 Temps and the Arizona sun. I have other rugs by this Co. as you can see.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these rugs. They are really nice for either indoor or outdoor use and they clean up easily. I do have to hang them up to dry if they get soaked in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: R. VanCamp

customer_reviews.title: Rug color quickly fades
customer_reviews.text: Purchased rug in terracotta/beige...color quickly faded (in two-three months) to yellow beige. Don’t recommend for outdoor use in direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Jemini W.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice outdoor/indoor rug, beautiful colors, sturdy yet easy to roll up and store out of the way when needed. Also dries easily if it gets wet outside.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Patio perfect
customer_reviews.text: This rug is perfect for my deck. The quality is great. I've had it for a month through storms and sunshine. It looks good so far. It has been easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Nice little mat
customer_reviews.text: Our deck gets hot in the summer and this runner works well to keep the walking area cool on bare feet it also adds a needed pop of color to the deck
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Rug is beautiful but it wrinkles and kinks if something is placed ...
customer_reviews.text: Rug is beautiful but it wrinkles and kinks if something is placed on top of it. Price is good, but I planned on putting a coffee table on top of it and I am constantly attempting to "walk off" the ripples in it. The appearance is pretty when it is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Carozza

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Outdoor Rug
customer_reviews.text: The product is true to the picture on Amazon. Very light. Color is fantastic. Very classy looking. The price was awesome. I have applied 3M UV protectant spray on it. I totally recommend this carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Ninad Patil

customer_reviews.title: Great rug
customer_reviews.text: Attractive rug. Pictures are accurate. Purchased two for outdoor use. They almost look too nice to be outdoors. They were wrapped tightly in plastic. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Chi chi

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug
customer_reviews.text: So far I love the rug. Only had it a few days so I can’t account for stain resistance and easy to clean. Though it looks like it could easily hosed off.
customer_reviews.author: Dpopp4805

customer_reviews.title: Works great outdoors or under the table!
customer_reviews.text: I use this under my table (I will only use outdoor rugs for under the table!) Looks great! Cleans really easily. I was hoping this would be more of a rust color, but it's pretty orange. Still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Layne

customer_reviews.title: Just what I'd been looking for...
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a 4x4 outdoor rug for quite some time. My landing is a square and the options I had found were not cute. This little rug is perfect! I love the stripes and the material has stood up to rain, snow, dirt and dogs! Oh, you can't beat the price on this guy either!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as I expected from the photo
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice as I expected from the photo, but decent enough quality - I paid $20 for this rug, I would never pay more. The packaging was filthy both inside and out. One can only assume the rug is as well. I'm using it outside, otherwise I probably wold have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: This is an outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: The colors are beautiful and exactly what I wanted for my bedroom. The feel of the rug? Not so much. This is definitely an outdoor rug. I expect this rug to scruff up my hardwood floors and need to buy an under-mat pad (if I keep it inside). It is shipped in plastic wrap. So it showed up with holes in the plastic from shipping and dirty in the spots where the plastic wore through. Shipping was fast and the rug came several days early.
customer_reviews.author: JPerry

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Good for layering
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as a layering mat, but the quality is nice enough to be a stand alone mat. Very cute! Nice and thick, doesn’t look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia F.

customer_reviews.title: Not white - more dirty beige
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Sort of disappointed the “bone” color is more beige. Also, the plastic package arrived ripped so there is some slight damage to the edges. Lastly, there is some fraying throughout rug - nothing major, I’ll just cut off and tuck under couch. On a positive note, the rug feels great under my feet and the thickness/quality is what I’d expect from Safavieh.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good Outdoor Rug
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rug for my living room, but the material is really better suited for outdoor use. Feels like plastic. I love the pattern, but it's not really a good indoor rug. Also - much browner than in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: M Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor rug completed my patio! I have received many compliments also asking where I got this. I’ve looked at many rugs similar to this and nothing could compare to the value of what I found on Amazon. A similar rug at Pottery Barn was over $200! Easy to clean, either with a broom or my cordless Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Cdngal35

customer_reviews.title: Perfect runner for my sun room
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it looks in my sun room. It's the perfect runner for our two doors to prevent people from slipping if their feet are wet. Was a little concerned the rug would move a lot on the concrete but so far no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole T.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Safavieh rug purchase and I have been very happy with both. They clean very easily. They don't have the cheap plastic look that some outdoor rugs do. I've used both of my indoors only but in high traffic areas. The "bone" color in the color I purchased was a bit darker than I had expected but I am very happy with the product and will likely purchase the Safavieh brand again. Quality product!
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Striped blue/beige fun rug!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty runner. Have it on my balcony. Very durable, withstands rain and stays put on windy days and nights. Very cute on my balcony and comfortable to walk on barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: susan johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awful colors in-person
customer_reviews.text: Color of the gray was more green. The beige was so yellow. Didn’t even open, went straight back to UPS for a return. The
customer_reviews.author: topdog

customer_reviews.title: GOOD VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking easy to clean and looks so good I ended up with it in my kitchen instead of on porch. Careful though because it does slid.
customer_reviews.author: Wise ole owl

customer_reviews.title: beautiful runner
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful runner that has held up well. Our cat uses it for her claws and it's still holding up without terrible wear. Nice thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Sushibear

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This rug is so cute! My porch is covered so I don’t know if it’s easy to clean or not but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: s&epark

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this rug
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rug. Very pleased with this rug. We got the 8x10 and it looks great
customer_reviews.author: Gallopo Family

customer_reviews.title: Awful chemical smell!
customer_reviews.text: How has no one written about the smell?! It’s been airing out outside for a day and the packaging it was in has fumed my whole garage. I’m not even going to bother returning I’m just throwing it out. This isn’t even a slight new carpet smell like some rugs have. This lingers and smells like chemicals galore. I will say though it would be a great outdoor rug if it weren’t for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but received used product.
customer_reviews.text: The rug is what we expected. Seems to be well made and durable. What we didn’t expect to receive is a previously used product. It not only shows signs of wear but it also contains a burn spot as from an ash from a cigarette.
customer_reviews.author: John Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: I do like the look of this rug and the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: I do like the look of this rug and the fact that we can open our front door easily (other rugs were too think) however we ordered the grey color. It definitely is NOT grey, more of a navy blue...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great size for our double front door. Quality is fantastic and especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great as Walkway to Jacuzzi
customer_reviews.text: Used this on grass of back yard to walk on to get into jacuzzi to keep feet clean. Very durable and worked great for what I used it for.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Does not measure at true length measurement. I ordered the 10 ft length and got 9.5 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to be an outdoor rug for our slippery when wet walkway. Does the job ok.
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. Works great for my patio. Durable, great color . Good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Halterman Wright

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor pool rugs
customer_reviews.text: Nice rugs and will work for us at our pool perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: max von schriltz

customer_reviews.title: Great product in every way
customer_reviews.text: I love these and bought 4 for pool side so surface is nit too hot in our feet. They are classy and lay flat. Very nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Waldowski

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This rug is perfect for my patio. The colors are great. I absolutely love this rug!
customer_reviews.author: Amy walker

customer_reviews.title: Cute Rug!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so cute! It seems like it will be very durable and easy to clean. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because some of the weaving was loose in one spot. I layered with another doormat so it’s not a big deal to me but if you’re using it on it’s own it would be annoying to receive it like this.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Nobrega

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my foyer. Way too thin. Bunches up and could trip someone easily.
customer_reviews.author: D. fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our front door entry and love the sage green color!
customer_reviews.author: J M J

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice outdoor rug has held up well and looks really good.
customer_reviews.author: gary devier

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug. I paired it with another outdoor rug in front of my door. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: belinda fimpel

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great rug!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 14’ runner for my front entry way- and it’s perfect! Wish it came with not slip backing but that’s okay- this run goes perfect with my farmhouse look I’m going for!
customer_reviews.author: Ambrosha

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Nice rug, seems durable and well made. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Not a white stripe.
customer_reviews.text: The rug is fine but the stripe is NOT white. It's cream bordering on yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and looks great! Exactly as described. very pleased how it looks
customer_reviews.author: Sandra H

customer_reviews.title: Color not grey
customer_reviews.text: Grey bone color is definitely more of a denim blue. Otherwise, quality seems to be pretty good. Still fairly pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Rug!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rug. I used it to layer our welcome mat on our porch and it’s perfect! Great quality for the money. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K Jett

customer_reviews.title: The color & design is great, hopefully the quality will be too
customer_reviews.text: The rug arrived with a large tear. I returned it & was quickly sent a replacement. The color & design is great, hopefully the quality will be too.
customer_reviews.author: Cim OHanlon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rug
customer_reviews.text: Always nice to be surprised at the quality. Neighbors are buying one.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug however I did not receive the correct size. It is supposed to be a runner and 7 feet long, it is hardly 4 feet long. Beautiful rug, wrong size. In order to return they want me to pay for shipping. I do not find that fair.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler & Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not much to it
customer_reviews.text: A bit scrawny, should have gone for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking rug! Nice quality-sturdy. It spruced up my front porch so much! The main color is more tan than ivory or cream. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: slynn

product_meta.title: Safavieh Courtyard Collection CY6062-244 Indoor/ Outdoor Area Rug, 5' 3" x 7' 7", Green/Beige
product_meta.description:
Size:5' 3" x 7' 7"| Color:Green/BeigeSafavieh's Courtyard Collection is inspired by timeless designs crafted with the softest polypropylene available. This rug is crafted using a power-loomed construction and features a main accent color of green. Perfect for any backyard, patio, deck or poolside, this rug will instantly turn your outdoor area into a resort-style entertaining space. 

Finely crafted for seasons in the sun and years of open-air gatherings, the Courtyard rug instantly elevates any interior or exterior décor to a space of visual inspiration. More than a decorative enhancement, this rug is both mildew and mold-resistant to ensure carefree maintenance. With its style, practicality, and transitional decorating options, this rug extends an open invitation to gather and may just spark impromptu parties. 



 *  Primary Color: Green
 * Pile Height: 0.25 inches
 *  Material: Polypropylene
 *  Style: Contemporary
 *  Construction: Power-loomed
 *  Rug Type: Indoor/Outdoor
 *  Feature: Latex Free
 *  Rug Dimensions: 5'3" x 7'7"
feature_bullets: Fashionable all weather design is perfect for outdoor use in the backyard, on the patio, porch, deck, or by the poolside
This remarkably easy care rug is kid and pet friendly It's also perfect for indoor living spaces prone to high traffic areas
Power loomed from enhanced premium polypropylene fibers for virtually no shedding and durability
Sleek 0.25 inch pile allows for seamless placement underneath indoor or outdoor furniture and in entryways
Safavieh has been a trusted brand and leader in home furnishings for over 100 years, providing quality craftsmanship, unmatched style and the latest trends

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars727 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
